content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace that received 10 iron ore and 10 coal, then produced 30 iron plates.
Use-case:
– Smelting iron ore into iron plates to supply resources for further crafting operations.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace that processed 50 copper ore with 10 coal and produced 45 copper plates.
Use-case:
– Converting harvested copper ore into copper plates for the production of copper cables and other components.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Mismatch for Entity Retrieval
  – Avoid using unsupported keywords (e.g. ‘radius’) or supplying extra positional arguments when calling get_entities. Follow the documented function signature to prevent TypeErrors.

• Lab Placement Failures
  – Verify that the lab item exists in the inventory before attempting to place it. Insufficient inventory leads to placement errors.

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortfalls
  – Ensure all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are available before initiating lab crafting. Incomplete resource chains may cause cascading crafting failures.

• Iteration on NoneType
  – Check that functions (like get_entities) return a valid list before iterating. Use an empty list as fallback to avoid TypeErrors from attempting to iterate over None.
